bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part I. Switzerland: Basle-St. Gall.
bibl.seg: Bruckner Albert and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part I. Switzerland: Basle-St. Gall.
Olten - Lausanne, Urs Graf-Verlag, 1954, in fol., xv-137 pp., nombr. pll.

C.R. par Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 35 (1955) pp. 134-135. - Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 31 (1956) No. 61, pp. 197-198. - Charles Samaran, CRAI 1955, pp. 156-157; - JSav 1955, pp. 42-43. - L. Santifaller, AnzWien 92 (1955) pp. 3-6.
